item.title: Air quality measurements
item.description: Air quality measurements The air quality data provides information on levels of various air pollutants, including particles, nitrogen dioxide and ground-level ozone, in Swedish cities and in rural areas. The data is provided in cooperation with SMHI. See Luftkvaliteten i realtid och prelimin√§r statistik for more information (Swedish). Data quality No information. License & conditions The data is licensed under Creative Commons Zero, CC0. Our APIs and data are provided "
